Hymn.Arabic: "افتديت قضيب ميراثك، جبل صهيون هذا الذي سكنت فيه،
Hymn.English: 2 Remember Your congregation, which You have purchased of old, The tribe of Your inheritance, which You have redeemed--This Mount Zion where You have dwelt.

Hymn.Arabic: أما الله فهو ملكنا قبل الدهور. صنعت خلاصًا في وسط الأرض. هلليلويا "
Hymn.English: 12 For God is my King from of old, Working salvation in the midst of the earth.
